prompt: Change the text 'BORCELLE' in the image to 'PACKAGE'. Keep it in ALL CAPS and maintain the original font style, weight, color, and center alignment above 'Dessert'.
knowledge_prompt: The task is a direct lexical substitution of the brand word while preserving typography and layout: same bold rounded font, uppercase, color, baseline and center alignment; the secondary line 'Dessert' must remain unchanged. Kerning should adapt naturally to the new word so visual balance with the dessert illustration is retained.
